Embedded GPS Tracker: Create a luggage tag that includes an embedded GPS tracker, allowing travelers to locate their bags in real-time. This tag can be connected to a mobile app, providing users with updates on the location of their luggage, even when they are not physically near it.

Smart Lock: Develop a luggage tag with a built-in smart lock, allowing travelers to secure their bags with a digital lock. This would provide an additional layer of security for travelers who are concerned about their luggage being lost or stolen.

Solar-Powered Charger: Create a luggage tag with a built-in solar panel, allowing travelers to charge their devices on the go. This would be especially useful for travelers who frequently find themselves away from power sources for extended periods of time.

Personalized Security System: Develop a luggage tag that includes a personalized security system, such as a built-in alarm or motion detector. This would alert travelers if someone tries to tamper with their luggage, providing an added layer of protection for their belongings.

Augmented Reality Display: Create a luggage tag with an augmented reality display, allowing travelers to view information about their destination, such as local attractions, weather, and currency exchange rates. This would provide an interactive and immersive experience for travelers, making their journey more enjoyable and convenient.
